remarks: Removing the first term from a sequence.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
seqsplit.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. S ) $.
seqsplit.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( ( x .+ y ) .+ z ) = ( x .+ ( y .+ z ) ) ) $.
seqsplit.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` ( M + 1 ) ) ) $.
seq1p.4 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
seq1p.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` x ) e. S ) $.
seq1p $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` N ) = ( ( F ` M ) .+ ( seq ( M + 1 ) ( .+ , F ) ` N ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d M x y z $.
$d N x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x y z $.
